creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: recto: black ink drawing of landscape with two trees and sky with textured pattern; verso: part of graphite drawing of the back of a vehicle loaded with baggage; boy seated in back of car
medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled, recto and verso [landscape, recto; back of vehicle, verso]
